name: Rollin' (itch) (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
name_original: Rollin' (itch) (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
description:
by Gabbie E.

You're a free rolling ball, but avoid the spikes!

Directions: Press SPACE to start the game, press SPACE to jump, and press ENTER to try again after a GAME OVER.
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
